summary: The package delivers a relational graph convolutional network model for processing heterogeneous graphs and a suite of helper utilities that streamline graph benchmark experiments, covering dataset wrappers, device and GPU handling, timing, and common decorators.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to quickly set up and run reproducible benchmark experiments for graph neural networks on heterogeneous and recommendation datasets, providing both a ready-made RGCN implementation and the necessary infrastructure for data loading, hardware management, and performance measurement.
